title: Stick It (Buddy Rich album)
text:
Stick It is a 1972 <a href="studio%20album">studio album</a> by <a href="Buddy%20Rich">Buddy Rich</a>, with his <a href="big%20band">big band</a>. The album was his third for <a href="RCA%20Records">RCA Records</a> as well as his last album for the label prior to his 1976 album "<a href="Speak%20No%20Evil%20%28Buddy%20Rich%20album%29">Speak No Evil</a>".
Track listing.
<a href="LP%20record">LP</a> side A
LP side B
bonus track on 1999 RCA <a href="Compact%20Disc">CD</a> re-issue
"track order on CD re-issue differs from original LP"
